answerText: Linus [Carl] Pauling[10] Pauling's scale is commonly used to measure this property of atoms, which measures how much they attract electrons. Fluorine has the highest value in Pauling's scale for it.
heading: Collegiate Novice |2012 | 7 | 10 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question:  This scientist came up with an erroneous triple-helical model for the structure of DNA.  [10] Name this American chemist who invented the concept of hybrid orbitals.
